Article Title: How sweetgreen plans to cut its carbon footprint in half in the next 6 years

Article Title: sweetgreen now offers 5 months of parental leave
Summary: healthy food chain sweetgreen is now offering employees five months of paid parental leave the benefit extends to "mothers fathers adoptive parents foster parents and others with new additions to their families" the company believes "it is our responsibility to lead the way given the us is one of the few countries that does not mandate any paid leave for new parents"
